title: Minneapolis Guide for Mexican Immigrants
name: Minneapolis Guide for Mexican Immigrants
description: This is a useful map showing the different resources such as shops, restaurants, and other places of interest for newly arrived Mexican immigrants. The map will also show hours of operation and specific details of the particular locations.

properties.name: Abbott-Northwestern Hospital
properties.description: This hospital is convenient for residents in south Minneapolis who do not want to call 911 and get rushed to HCMC in downtown. It's the largest hospital in the Twin Cities and offers many services for patients. Spanish interpreters are available.Hours of operation:Services offered around the clock.

properties.name: CAPI
properties.description: This is an organization that helps immigrants and refugees be self-sufficient and offers many services such as finding employment and housing.Hours of operation:M - F 8 am - 5 pmMinneapolis, MN 55406

properties.name: Community-University Health Care Center (CUHCC)
properties.description: This is a clinic in Minneapolis by the U of M- Twin Cities that offers medical and dental appointments. Spanish interpreters are available.Hours of operation:Monday - Friday8:00am - 5:00pmMinneapolis, MN 55404

properties.name: Franklin Library
properties.description: This library in Minneapolis offers a large selection of books and videos that may be borrowed and resources such as Driver's Education booklets for new citizens. Computer access with internet is also free and printing is available.Hours of operation:M	-- Tu	12-8 W	10-6 Th	12-8 F	10-6 Sa	10-6

properties.name: Mercado Central
properties.description: This place offers a variety of shops and restaurants for Mexican residents.Hours of operation:10:30AM-6:30PM7 Days a week

properties.name: Metro Transit Store
properties.description: This is where bus and light rail riders can get information on buying transit passes and route info.Hours of operation:Monday - Friday:7:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m.Minneapolis, MN 55402

properties.name: Midtown Global Market
properties.description: This center has small ethnic restaurants including ones owned by Mexican people, and multiple shops that sell cultural food items. It also hosts community programs such as music and dance.Hours of operation:Monday - Saturday 10:00am - 8:00pmSunday 11:00am - 6:00pm

properties.name: Minneapolis Community and Technical College
properties.description: This community college in downtown Minneapolis offers ESL teaching to new immigrants and learners can also enroll in adult programs for degrees after ESL at the college.Hours of operation:Monday - Friday  6:30 a.m. - 10:30 p.m.Saturday 7:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.Sunday closed

properties.name: South Workforce Center
properties.description: This is the workforce center in south Minneapolis that helps job seekers find employment and help anyone explore careers. Most services are free.Hours of operation:8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.Monday - FridayMinneapolis, MN 55407

properties.name: Waite House
properties.description: This is a community center in Minneapolis that provides food packages to eligible low-income residents and the elderly.Hours of operation:Mon – Fri: 10:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. Minneapolis, MN 55404
